Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Found it. The consciousness of a trapped Forsaken from not long ago.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But we don't have any other choice. We're only able to reach this place because of their sacrifices, so we can't let them down.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'I know... Onwards! Toward the central consciousness container!', 4: '1'}
